post.body: says it's beginning to look alot like Christmas...oh the power of TV advertising! Asda has alot to answer for LOL :)
is planning a strategy for next year's business activities...bring it on!!
don't forget to come to the Worcester Music Festival Open Evening, tonight at Keystones, Worcester, at 7.00pm!
working on some exciting new projects for 2009...bring it on!!
trying to upload some photos to facebook but the uploader thing won't work grr!
is gearing up for a busy few weeks.
is thrilled at how well the Worcester Music Festival went...please visit the website www.worcestermusicfestival.co.uk
please come and support the the first ever Worcester Music Festival this weekend...any journalists out there want to cover it, contact me :)
is busy working on the Worcester Music Festival...www.worcestermusicfestival.co.uk
is counting down to Fairport's Cropredy Convention next Thursday!
working hard and playing hard!!
is off to London baby yeah!!
coming up with some good case studies thanks to J for Ventura Comms.
going to see Hancock at the cinema later today.
working on juggling many different things at once!
working on launching a new division of Ventura Communications Ltd
still recovering from the awesome concert with Def Leppard and Whitesnake at the NEC last night, fantastic!! I got totally rocked!!
juggling many different projects and clients, thank god for working with JT...don't know what I would do without him right now!!
looking forward to meeting Ten Fifty tonight
about to go and watch Battlestar Galactica...after being beaten at several games of pool, havne't played pool for years, must practise!!
says "happy new year"!
